responses.rationale: The segment discusses human infection risk, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment reports biological deaths, not prices or economic metrics as defined by Q9.
The segment reports on the cause and location of deaths and distance, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment provides advice/instructions, not reporting prices or economic metrics.
The segment reports numerical metrics including economic cost ('cost the federal government nearly $1 billion') using standard verbs ('killed', 'cost').
